error.msg: The class 'Link_out' does not have a constructor although it has private member variables.
error.verbose: The class 'Link_out' does not have a constructor although it has private member variables. Member variables of builtin types are left uninitialized when the class is instantiated. That may cause bugs or undefined behavior.
